messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

services external access october pm also make possible environment externally order test production environment functionality sites location remote sites sites location remote sites best regards engineer october pm hello currently working charts charts registered sites which accessible externally looking exposing make accessible please advise possible implement best regards engineer

message.reasoning:
**Identifying Ticket Categories**

I'm currently focused on parsing ticket text to identify relevant keywords. My goal is to map these keywords to the appropriate categories: Hardware, HR Support, Access, Miscellaneous, Storage, Purchase, Internal Project, or Administrative rights. The presence of specific keywords within the ticket text will be the main indicator for category assignment.


**Defining Ticket Type**

I've homed in on "Access" as the fitting category for this ticket, given the "external access" and "remote sites" keywords within the ticket text. The terms like "exposing" and "implement" further solidify the access-related nature of the request. Now, I will devise rules to improve the accuracy of my classification method, and expand my keyword dictionary to address diverse ticket phrasing.
